In this revealing documentary film about Hitler's last hours of life, made as a co-production between Discovery Channel, RTL, British BBC
and Time Watch, new facts to the surface. Facts based on revelations made after the fall of the Berlin Wall. The film throws light on many of the issues that have been in the shadows since the war ended in 1945 ..

What really happened in Hitler's bunker when the Russians marched into Berlin? How came it that the allies are not told the truth about what they found in the bunker? Why has, until now, all the facts about Adolf Hitler's last days in life kept secret? This shocking documentary, many of the answers. Interviews with people who were in Hitler's proximity during his last days of life, findings that were made in connection with the end of the war, but kept secret for half a century, paints a clear picture of the shocking hours for the third kingdom leaders, now decimated to a defeat and mentally unstable man in life.

Extras: Documentary film "Fascismens dark
century "for the entire 1900-century cruel war history.
